input_email_body:
Subject: Concern Over Unsecured Medical Records

Dear Customer Service Team,

I am contacting you to address a critical issue related to the security of our medical records. It has come to our attention that these files may have been accessed by unauthorized users due to outdated firewall configurations.

Upon preliminary investigation, it seems that the root cause could be the lack of recent updates to our firewall rules, which have not been modified in a considerable time You can reach me at maria.gonzalez@shop.es.. We have attempted to mitigate the situation by restarting the server and reviewing the logs for signs of unusual activities, but the problem remains unresolved, and we are still determining the extent of the breach.

We kindly request your immediate assistance in this matter to secure our medical records and prevent further unauthorized access My name is Omar Hassan.. Your expertise would be invaluable in recommending the necessary actions to update our firewall settings and enhance our system's security.

We are looking forward to your prompt response and guidance on this urgent issue.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
